title: LabelBar
description: Contains label bar and its items.

ItemSeparator.description: To visually separate the items by adding a separator dot between the items. Only applicable to horizontal layout.

Layout.description: Card body content label bar layout properties.

LayoutType.description: Layout orientation for the label bar items

Item.description: Dynamic binding of Item. The item can only be label bar item. `Item` must be paired with `BindingCollection`.

BindingCollection.description: Definition of the BindingCollection to dynamically populate the collection. You can set this to binding/rule to return an array of data items. Note: If this is set to binding/rule, you must return an array of data items.

Items.description: Contains items to be displayed in a row of `LabelBar`. `Items` is ignored if `Item` and `BindingCollection` are defined.

anyOf.description: Expects return of `LabelBarItem` in array format.
